46ddb1701b59f8cbf80225ea8e85bd2991ab6ee0515c011d79a265f47f93fe","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://959ba1dcc93439c82e53a1e9858bac831a3c003eae82fc35edd931d7e7da4f77","dweb:/ipfs/QmQu2vGG9bDpuTHYJNSW6aXCp4FYCVzew2XpjVjZm59CAx"]},"lib/mud/packages/solecs/src/interfaces/IWorld.sol":{"keccak256":"0xde47447df2e0f42b66a1c9ec6432ed30cad604de2b5eb673341abb772832be80","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://83bd8652b8531460cc580d6cd28fc8f0448ec9f032cd6581aee5298a4d0a12e9","dweb:/ipfs/QmZsnaajiBVjcC6S8K39wdfnyZcH4B1FZYe2qL3p4iiwXD"]},"lib/mud/packages/solecs/src/interfaces/Query.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3956cfb4b92afd3eccfea772480deb00ba573629bc0f36db5d948e2d168377cb","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://1aafe610e9283e1d7b1f45ba49cf77c8cf770241eeaa5317171df30b5f114c7d","dweb:/ipfs/QmYShHHJqSfkdY3vcbKS18AuBpBmfwMUzebxZbPpgZDcfq"]}},"version":1}

params.writer: Address to grant write access to.

params.value: Abi-encoded value to get the list of entities with this value for.

params.entity: Entity to get the raw value in this component for.
Entity to check whether it has a value in this component for.

params.indexer: Address of the indexer to notify when a component value is set.

params.entity: Entity to remove from this component.
Entity to set the value for.
params.value: Value to set for the given entity.

authorizeWriter(address).notice: Grant write access to this component to the given address. Can only be called by the owner of this component.

getEntities().notice: Get a list of all entities that have a value in this component.

getEntitiesWithValue(bytes).notice: Get a list of all entities that have the specified value in this component.

getRawValue(uint256).notice: Get the raw (abi-encoded) value of the given entity in this component.

getSchema().notice: Return the keys and value types of the schema of this component.

has(uint256).notice: Check whether the given entity has a value in this component.

owner().notice: Get the owner of this component

registerIndexer(address).notice: Register a new indexer that gets notified when a component value is set.

registerWorld(address).notice: Register this component in the given world.

remove(uint256).notice: Remove the given entity from this component. Registers the update in the World contract. Can only be called by addresses with write access to this component.

set(uint256,bytes).notice: Set the given component value for the given entity. Registers the update in the World contract. Can only be called by addresses with write access to this component.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership of this component to a new owner. Can only be called by the current owner.

world().notice: Reference to the World contract this component is registered in

writeAccess(address).notice: Addresses with write access to this component

documentation.text: Reference to the World contract this component is registered in
Owner of the component has write access and can given write access to other addresses
Addresses with write access to this component
Set of entities with values in this component
Mapping from entity id to value in this component
Reverse mapping from value to set of entities
List of indexers to be updated when a component value changes
Public identifier of this component
Revert if caller is not the owner of this component
Revert if caller does not have write access to this component
Get the owner of this component

Register this component in the given world.
 @param _world Address of the World contract.
Return the keys and value types of the schema of this component.

Remove the given entity from this component.
 Registers the update in the World contract.
 Can only be called by addresses with write access to this component.
 @param entity Entity to remove from this component.

Check whether the given entity has a value in this component.
 @param entity Entity to check whether it has a value in this component for.

Get the raw (abi-encoded) value of the given entity in this component.
 @param entity Entity to get the raw value in this component for.
Get a list of all entities that have a value in this component.

Get a list of all entities that have the specified value in this component.
 @param value Abi-encoded value to get the list of entities with this value for.

Register a new indexer that gets notified when a component value is set.
 @param indexer Address of the indexer to notify when a component value is set.

Components are a key-value store from entity id to component value.
 They are registered in the World and register updates to their state in the World.
 They have an owner, who can grant write access to more addresses.
 (Systems that want to write to a component need to be given write access first.)
 Everyone has read access.
